name: suttacentral-static
description: A fast and minimal alternative frontend for SuttaCentral.net

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=prod NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" pnpm run build:nav && pnpm run build:texts
scripts.build:nav: NODE_ENV=prod NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" SKIP_TEXTS=1 pnpm exec eleventy
scripts.build:texts: NODE_ENV=prod NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" ONLY_TEXTS=1 pnpm exec eleventy

author: benmneb
